message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the enthusiasm behind it. However, I believe I can find something similar within my budget. I am willing to pay $100 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125.
I'm glad we're able to discuss this further, Alice. While I understand your position, I still believe I can find a comparable product within my budget. I am willing to pay $110 for the product.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell the product to you for $130.
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. I appreciate your effort in trying to meet my budget. I am willing to pay $120 for the product.
